summary: This document is a running board log from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York dated July 30, 2019. It records inmate movements, counts, and activities, including the transfer of Jeffrey Epstein from unit HA to ZA at 12:21 PM, shortly before his death.

events.title: MCC inmate movements and counts
events.description: The Metropolitan Correctional Center conducted routine inmate counts, recorded movements (court, hospital, removals), and performed body alarm testing. The starting count was 767 inmates.

locations: Tombs (likely referring to the Manhattan Detention Complex)
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein (inmate #76318-054) was recorded as being transferred from housing unit HA to ZA at 12:21 PM on July 30, 2019.
This log documents routine prison operations on the day before Epstein's death on August 10, 2019.
The document shows inmate counts, movements for court, hospital, and removal proceedings, and security testing.
Epstein is listed among other inmates with standard movements, with no special annotations in this log entry.
